issue.title: :warning: Clearbit’s Free Logo API (logo.clearbit.com) is Being Discontinued – Update Required
issue.body:
# :rotating_light: Deprecation Notice :rotating_light:

Clearbit's free Logo API (logo.clearbit.com) will be discontinued on **December 1, 2025**, and will stop working on that date.

## What You Need to Know:
We have identified your project as one that uses logo.clearbit.com - you’ll need to migrate to an alternative solution.
We’ve shared detailed information and alternative approaches in [our announcement on the HubSpot Developer Community](https://developers.hubspot.com/changelog/upcoming-sunset-of-clearbits-free-logo-api).

## Recommended Next Steps
1. **Audit your code**: Identify where logo.clearbit.com is used
2. **Consider alternatives**: Review options and recommendations in our official post
3. **Update dependencies**: If this project is part of a larger system, notify relevant maintainers

We appreciate all the developers who have used this service over the years! Check out the [HubSpot Developer Community](https://developers.hubspot.com/changelog/upcoming-sunset-of-clearbits-free-logo-api) for more details.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: Fix #202207 viprow.nu
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202207

There's actually a script connection `https://lepomisprinted.shop/thRPFjI0rSrv5TNE/10879` which is blocked by

```adb
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z]{2}\.)?[0-9a-z]{5,16}\.[a-z]{3,7}\/[a-z](?=[a-z]{0,25}[0-9A-Z])[0-9a-zA-Z]{3,26}\/\d{4,6}(?:\?[_a-z]=[0-9a-z-]+)?$/$subdocument,script,xmlhttprequest,third-party,match-case
```

but I don't know if that rule works on user's browser?

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: www.zakzak.co.jp

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hltv.org/matches](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hltv.org%2Fmatches) ### Comment > With the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter enabled, clicking on any match link takes about 5 seconds to start loading. issue.title: projectelixiros.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://projectelixiros.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fprojectelixiros.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > The problem is already obvious, I want to express myself and the anger inside me, so what I write may not be quite right. > what the hell "open source" project doesn't allow ad blockers?! I can't even browse the website how do I know they're good? As if that wasn't enough, it also says "either turn it off or pay", I feel sorry for those who install this operating system on their phones, I wouldn't be surprised if one day they have to pay to unlock the screen. They're messing with the GitHub logo in the bottom left. I curse this revenue model. > I just wanted to write because they were so intrusive and I was so far away from (almost all) today's social media that I had no place to vent... > > I'm sorry and thank you for reading. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lhvxak8e0i88ows4g8scwogo04c8cowp9b47f10ahw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.10 System version: | iOS 15.8.3 (19H386) License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist Other extensions used: | N/A

comment.body:
It is fixed for Pro version. Free version uses native Safari Content Blocker API which does not support advanced rules.

You may add `@@||projectelixiros.com^$generichide` to user rules and wait 60s for applying.

Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

comment.body:
@zloyden если каждый раз открывать новое окно в режиме инкогнито, то у меня каждый раз воспроизводится.

Такие правила помогают:
```adblock
studentappcentre.com#%#//scriptlet('set-cookie', 'exitIntentShown', 'true')
```
или
```adblock
studentappcentre.com##.exit_intent_popup
```

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
@Yuki2718 and I think you need to use a hint `!+ NOT_VALIDATE` so rules convert for users, see https://github.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersCompiler/issues/245

Here is the example: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/1f5458ea9c496aedbcd43322e0470021afd98e5a

The anti-adblock can be fixed by this rule:
```adblock
weshare.is,skycall.online#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')

comment.body:
MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
You can add rules from commit to user rules:
```adblock
skycall.online#%#//scriptlet('adjust-setInterval', 'wpsafe', '*', '0.001')
weshare.is#%#//scriptlet('adjust-setInterval', 'downloadTimer', '*', '0.001')
telcit.site#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "blurred", "false")
skycall.online#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', 'DOMContentLoaded', '/^function\(e\) \{ init\(\); \}$/')
skycall.online##body > #page + script + div[id][class*=" "]
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/r.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.jp%2Fgp%2Fr.html) ### Comment > 返品画面(`https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/r.html?…`と続くURL)を開くと、本来は返品受付センターという返品の進捗を確認する画面(`https://www.amazon.co.jp/spr/returns/confirmation/…`と続くURL)にリダイレクトします。 > しかし、AdGuard URL Tracking filterを有効にしていると、返品受付センターへリダイレクトが起こらず、返品を開始する画面(返品物の選択画面)に遷移してしまいます。 > そのため、返品の進捗が確認できなくなってしまっています。 > この問題は、Actually Legitimate URL Shortener Toolを有効にした時にも発生しました。 ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856
